title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Agentic Code Generation for Industrial Analytics & Predictive Maintenance-PEX320
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 工业分析和预测性维护的智能体代码生成 - PEX320
abstract: Plant floor personnel face daily challenges monitoring critical equipment in real-time. While they possess deep operational expertise, they depend on IT teams for monitoring solutions and complex data analysis - creating delays and inefficiencies. Through live coding demonstrations, this session shows how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter and Strands Agents enable operations teams to ask 'Analyze our motor's vibration patterns for maintenance scheduling' and watch the system generate and execute Python code using pandas, scipy, and scikit-learn for predictive analytics. We'll demonstrate IoT SiteWise data retrieval, AI-generated analytics, and MCP tools for work order creation - transforming natural language into executable machine learning that closes the operational loop without requiring data science expertise.
abstract_cn: 车间人员在实时监控关键设备方面面临日常挑战。虽然他们拥有深厚的运营专业知识，但依赖IT团队提供监控解决方案和复杂数据分析——造成延迟和低效。通过现场编码演示，本次会议展示Amazon Bedrock AgentCore代码解释器和Strands代理如何使运营团队能够询问"分析我们电机的振动模式以制定维护计划"，并观看系统使用pandas、scipy和scikit-learn生成并执行Python代码进行预测分析。我们将演示IoT SiteWise数据检索、AI生成的分析以及用于创建工单的MCP工具——将自然语言转换为可执行的机器学习，在不需要数据科学专业知识的情况下闭合运营循环。
